page.title: 01 General Review
page.content: The block includes much of the residential area of Stevenage New Town, whose population is 78,000.The housing is mainly terraced and dates from 1951 in the Monkswood area,to the Poplars which is still under construction.A large country park,Fairlands Valley, runs north-south through the residential area.It's main attractions are the three lakes,and the sailing centre.On the eastern fringes of the block there is open countryside which narrowly separates an expanding Stevenage from the village of Aston.The old village of Shephall is now surrounded by housing. In Stevenage, cycle ways keep bikes and mopeds separate from motor traffic on the main roads.There are small neighbourhood shopping centres,but the block is devoid of any major shopping or industrial centre.
